b.font: How to Access Your Google Account

font.b: If you have a computer at home,
you can use that to access your google account. Just go to google.com

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 13:56 pm CDT

div.span: Sunny, with a high near 51. North wind 5 to 10 mph becoming west northwest.
Mostly clear, with a low around 37. Southwest wind 5 to 15 mph.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 64. Windy, with a west northwest wind 15 to 20 mph increasing to 25 to 30 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph.
